headline: Valero Energy (VLO) – Among the Best High Yield Crude Oil Stocks to Buy After Trump’s Blitz in Venezuela
summary: Valero Energy Corporation (NYSE:VLO) is included among the 10 High Yield Crude Oil Stocks to Buy After Trump’s Blitz in Venezuela. Valero Energy Corporation (NYSE:VLO) is the world’s premier independent petroleum refiner and a leading producer of low-carbon transportation fuels. headline: Is Phillips 66 Poised to Gain From a Favorable Refining Backdrop?
summary: PSX's refining arm benefits from strong margins, with widening light-heavy spreads and cheaper heavy crude anticipated to support higher margins.

headline: Can VLO Continue to Earn From Ongoing Softness in Oil Price?
summary: Valero stands to gain as crude prices stay soft, lifting refining margins, strengthening its balance sheet and supporting dividends and buybacks.
